The Inu Archive Page on Tablet

Description

Project description

Trapped with old technology with his old portfolio like Flash and FTP Inu wanted a new website for easy uploading and categorizing his work.

We have created a special Wordpress backend for easy photography publishing. And a design which stays out of the viewer's way and is still responsive.

Services and Technologies
